item.title: CoinDesk 20 performance update: Solana (SOL) falls 4.2%, leading index lower
item.description: Ethereum (ETH), down 3.7% from Thursday, joined Solana (SOL) as an underperformer.

item.title: Bitcoin threatens new breakdown as US PPI sends gold to 1-month high
